author: Michelle Farrar
comment: I HAD to come back and five-star this. So *intuitive*, it worked immediately after totally getting lost trying other apps. And then there was even more cool things to do! THANK YOU

author: Wade Barrett
comment: My phone does not have an sd card slot, so i use a micro usb on the go (otg) device on my phone to access music. Developers, please allow app to support otg devices; Disc dj app, a good dj app contender, has this feature. Also, kindly consider giving users the option of adding at least 1 custom sample (for example: Dj Wade, sound the big ting man). I am Jamaican 🇯🇲. Please add a back arrow for the samplers and keep up the good work!
